posts.title: chain derailment
posts.excerpt: A 1x10 drivetrain is supposed to be sufficient for an amateur biker.
posts.content: A 1x10 drivetrain is supposed to be sufficient for a moderate biker. My current bike, a Cannondale Topstone 3 I named Inspector Clouseau, is the unfortunate corpus to a microSHIFT Sword gravel groupset with a 1x10 drivetrain. I really loved it for the first 300-400 miles I rode it, which makes sense given my past bike experience was on the 3-speed, 40 pound classic bicycles of Washington D.C.'s Capital Bikeshare program.

posts.title: aws sagemaker
posts.excerpt: What should I do, run 8 SageMaker endpoints for 2 days or pay rent for six months?
